properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 16 at 9:50AM PST until January 16 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County.

* WHEN...Until 9 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines.
Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be
difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusts will increase to around 40 MPH later
this morning, then increase again up to 60 MPH this evening
before tapering off later in the day. Enhancement from hills and
mountains will likely create sudden wind gusts that are
difficult to prepare for and mitigate with semi trucks.
properties.instruction:
Operators of high profile vehicles should be especially cautious
for the possibility of sudden, strong crosswinds. Areas of blowing
dust may also limit visibility. At home, close windows and secure
temporary and lawn furniture.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST THIS EVENING
